attributes.action: [prime Minister to intervene quickly and decisively to stop yet another disgraceful the rip-off by certain city speculators causing our motor fuel prices to be artificially high when there is an apparent glut of oil worldwide!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the prime Minister MPS is now moving quickly to deal with the disgraceful damaging rip-off by many MPS, then why isnt he just as aggresive in protecting us all from this blatant rip-off making us all pay extortionate and  uneccesary high prices for motor fuel...if not then would he please care to explain why he isn't highly concerned about this area of gross misconduct?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
